pages.text: To open a vault, you require a $(l)Vault Crystal$() and a $(l)Portal Frame$(). $(br)The Portal Frame can be build out of any type of (polished) $(l)Vault Stone.$() $(br2)Right click with a $(l)Vault Crystal$() inside the portal to open up the Vault Dimension.

pages.name: Vault Portal
pages.text: The portal may vary in size with a $(l)minimum of 4x5$() and a $(l)maximum of 23x23$().
